patterns: how many courses are there in this college
responses:
GTBIT offers 
1. Computer Science engineering
2. Information Technology
3. Electrical Engineering

patterns: how long will be CSE or IT course
how long will it take to complete IT or CSE course
responses: All the courses in our college have a duration of 4 years

patterns: what is the location of the college.
responses: GTBIT is located in Rajouri Garden

patterns: how many semesters are there in a year
how many semesters one should study in a year
responses: There are two semesters in a year.

patterns: how many months are there in a semester
how long will be a single semester
responses: The single semester will be around 4 months.

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission
responses: Students are given admission based on their JEE rank,Each year there is a new cutoff based on the overall rank of all the students.

patterns: how many classes will be there in a day
responses: There may be 6 or 7 classes per day. Each class will be of 1 hour.
Sessional exams are held halfway through the semester and final exams are held at the end of the semester

patterns: How many Assignments we get every semester
How many marks does the assignment carry
responses: Assignmenets are given throught out the semester and carry few marks and have to be submitted before the deadline
You can message us here at any hours. But our college premises will be open from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm only.

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the college conducts any fun program
responses:
Yes, Of course. Our college not only provides excellent education but also encourage students to take part in different curriculum activities. The college conducts yearly programs like Sports meet, Fest,. 
 Also our college has basketball court, table tennis, chess, carrom board and many more refreshment zones.

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like internet, library, classes with AC, discusson room, canteen, parking space, and student service for any students queries.

patterns: how much is the college fee
responses: All courses have an approximate fees of around 1,20,000
